", jealousy can be a powerful emotion. One way to overcome it is to focus on your own progress and not compare yourself to others. Remember, everyone has their own unique strengths and weaknesses, and it's important to focus on what you can do rather than what others have done.

"One way to combat jealousy is to try and see things from a different perspective. Instead of focusing on what others have accomplished, try to focus on the positive aspects of your own life and what you have achieved.

"Another way to deal with jealousy is to try and learn from others. Instead of being envious of their accomplishments, try to see if there are any skills or techniques they have used that you can apply to your own life.
"It's also important to remember that jealousy is often born out of insecurity. By focusing on building your own self-confidence and self-esteem, you can reduce the negative effects of jealousy.
